con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline="2018-08-31" init-date="2018-08-24" name="Easeypeezie" code="ORDER0001"> <labels/> <material-assignments/> <advance-measurements/> <criterion-requirements/> <children/> </order> </order-list>

con:restRequest.name: PostProjects
con:restRequest.con:request: <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline="${DataSource#deadAAAA-MM-JJ}" init-date="${DataSource#initAAAA-MM-JJ}" name="${DataSource#NOM}" code="${DataSource#PROJECT_CODE}"> <labels/> <material-assignments/> <advance-measurements/> <criterion-requirements/> <children/> </order> </order-list>

con:restRequest.name: PostResource - Participant
con:restRequest.con:request: <resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <worker nif="${PropertiesParticipant#ID}" surname="${PropertiesParticipant#NOM}" first-name="${PropertiesParticipant#PRENOM}" code="${PropertiesParticipant#CODE}"> <calendar capacity="1" parent="CALENDAR0001" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0005"> <calendar-exception-list/> <calendar-data-list> <calendar-data parent-calendar="CALENDAR0001" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0005-0001"> <hours-per-day-list/> </calendar-data> </calendar-data-list> <calendar-availability-list> <calendar-availability startDate="2018-08-27T00:00:00+02:00" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0005-0002"/> </calendar-availability-list> </calendar> <criterion-satisfaction-list/> <resources-cost-category-assignment-list/> </worker> </resource-list>

con:restRequest.name: PostResource - Machine
con:restRequest.con:request: <resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <machine description="${PropertiesMachine#DESCRIPTION}" name="${PropertiesMachine#NAME}" code="${PropertiesMachine#CODE}" xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <calendar capacity="1" parent="CALENDAR0001" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0006"> <calendar-exception-list/> <calendar-data-list> <calendar-data parent-calendar="CALENDAR0001" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0006-0001"> <hours-per-day-list/> </calendar-data> </calendar-data-list> <calendar-availability-list> <calendar-availability startDate="2018-08-27T00:00:00+02:00" code="RESOURCE_CALENDAR0006-0002"/> </calendar-availability-list> </calendar> <criterion-satisfaction-list/> <resources-cost-category-assignment-list/> </machine> </resource-list>
